{{fr-noun|m}}

# a group of [[French]] [[Second World War]] [[prisoner of war]] in [[Germany]] whose job was to carry [[timber]]
types.html:
zaun-kommando m (plural zaun-kommandos)

  1. a group of French Second World War prisoner of war in Germany whose job was to carry timber
trans: a group of French Second World War prisoner of war in Germany whose job was to carry timber
